title: Can a Start-Up Help Companies Monitor and Manage Their Water Use?
description: Waterplan, which has some impressive clients, says it can — and just as water stewardship is becoming increasingly urgent.
dc:creator: Craig S. Smith
media:credit: Emilio Parra Doiztua for The New York Times
media:description: From left: Matias Comercio, Olivia Cesio, José Ignacio Galindo and Nicolas Wertheimer, the founders of Waterplan.
